privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro_text: Welcome to Anonymium AI. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have complete control over your data. Our philosophy is simple: Your data is yours, and it should never leave your device without your explicit consent.
privacy_policy.collection_text: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data using our application. Anonymium AI operates entirely locally on your device.
privacy_policy.processing_text: All AI processing, including text generation and voice recognition, happens directly on your hardware.
privacy_policy.third_party_text: Since the application functions offline and does not connect to external servers for its core functionality, we do not share data with third-party services.
privacy_policy.changes_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time.
